definition: Disneyland/also written 迪士尼樂園|迪士尼乐园[Di2 shi4 ni2 Le4 yuan2]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

sentences.english: He was headed for Tokyo Disneyland.
sentences.chinese: 他是冲着东京迪斯尼乐园去的。

sentences.english: While Disney allowed all the outdoor elements of the celebration to be free to the public.
sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼乐园的所以外部庆典活动都想大众免费开放。

sentences.english: At the next intersection, turn left and you’ll be at the entrance to Disney World.
sentences.chinese: 在下一个路口再向左转你就到了迪斯尼乐园的门口了。

sentences.english: I took them all down to the disney world for a week on my nickle .
sentences.chinese: 我自费带他们全体到迪斯尼乐园去玩了一个星期。

sentences.english: Walking into Hong Kong Disneyland, you feel you are in a wonderland.
sentences.chinese: 走在香港迪斯尼乐园里，你仿若进入了一个仙境。

sentences.english: EuroDisney is a good place to visit .
sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼乐园是个观光的好地方。

sentences.english: Q. Why don't they have fireworks at Euro Disney?
sentences.chinese: 为什么欧洲的迪斯尼乐园不允许放烟火呢？

sentences.english: Today, I went to Disneyworld. I fell and hit my head while jumping up and down to see Ariel.
sentences.chinese: 今天我在迪斯尼乐园里摔了，还撞破了脑袋。

sentences.english: He told immigration officials he had planned to visit Tokyo Disneyland.
sentences.chinese: 他对移民官员说他想要游览东京迪斯尼乐园。

sentences.english: The central attraction of the Magic Kingdom is a place of excitement and thrills for everyone.
sentences.chinese: 魔术世界是迪斯尼乐园最具吸引力的地方。

sentences.english: A month after the diagnosis, they went to Disneyland Paris.
sentences.chinese: 确诊过了一个月，他们就去了巴黎迪斯尼乐园。

sentences.english: In Tokyo the car park of Disneyland was reported flooded.
sentences.chinese: 报道说东京迪斯尼乐园的停车场已经被淹。

sentences.english: Before Disneyland, there was Copenhagen’s Tivoli Gardens (which Walt Disney used as a prototype for his first theme park in Anaheim, California, a model later re-exported to Tokyo and Paris).
sentences.chinese: 加州迪斯尼乐园的模式而后又被输出到日本和巴黎。

sentences.english: Why don't they have fireworks at Euro Disney?
sentences.chinese: 为什么欧洲的迪斯尼乐园不允许放烟火呢？

sentences.english: In Los Angeles, he and I went to Disneyland.
sentences.chinese: 在洛杉矾，他和我经常去迪斯尼乐园。

sentences.english: We bought a two-day pass to Disneyland.
sentences.chinese: 我们买了可用两日的迪斯尼乐园门票。

definition: Disney (company name, surname)/also written 迪士尼[Di2 shi4 ni2]
merry-go-round/carousel/Carousel, South Korean TV soap opera
